sentences.text: The old American tank Taiwan is modernizing to fight China in a war.
sentences.filtered_text: The old American tank Taiwan is modernizing to fight China in a war.

sentences.text: The M60 Patton tank is one of the most iconic tanks of the Cold War.
sentences.filtered_text: The M60 Patton tank is one of the most iconic tanks of the Cold War.

sentences.text: While it did not see use in the Vietnam War, it saw extensive use by Israel and Iran in the various hot wars of the 20th century,
sentences.filtered_text: While it did not see use in the Vietnam War, it saw extensive use by Israel and Iran in the various hot wars of the 20th century,

sentences.text: and comprised the vast bulk of the U.S. Army's tank fleet facing down the Warsaw Pact throughout the 1970s and 1980s.
sentences.filtered_text: and comprised the vast bulk of the U.S. Army's tank fleet facing down the Warsaw Pact throughout the 1970s and 1980s.

sentences.text: It was also used by U.S. Marines in Granada and Operation Desert Storm.
sentences.filtered_text: It was also used by U.S. Marines in Granada and Operation Desert Storm.

sentences.text: While it was phased out of American service in the 2000s and most other tank fleets by the 2010s the M60 continues to serve on in some countries.
sentences.filtered_text: While it was phased out of American service in the 2000s and most other tank fleets by the 2010s the M60 continues to serve on in some countries.

sentences.text: Advanced upgrade packages are being added to remaining M60s in an attempt to make them adequate for today's battlefield.
sentences.filtered_text: Advanced upgrade packages are being added to remaining M60s in an attempt to make them adequate for today's battlefield.

sentences.text: Most of these packages are based on the M60A3, the latest variant to see widespread service introduced in the 1980s.
sentences.filtered_text: Most of these packages are based on the M60A3, the latest variant to see widespread service introduced in the 1980s.

sentences.text: Some of the upgrade packages are based on the far older M60A1 variant.
sentences.filtered_text: Some of the upgrade packages are based on the far older M60A1 variant.

sentences.text: This article will discuss the Taiwanese proposed upgrade package, the Turkish upgrade package that has seen combat service and the low-end Thai upgrade package.
sentences.filtered_text: This article will discuss the Taiwanese proposed upgrade package, the Turkish upgrade package that has seen combat service and the low-end Thai upgrade package.

sentences.text: Taiwan
sentences.filtered_text: [人名]

sentences.text: Taiwan's M60 upgrade is probably the most up-to-date.

sentences.text: After failing to acquire M1 Abrams tanks from the United States,
sentences.filtered_text: After failing to acquire M1 Abrams tanks from the United States,

sentences.text: Taiwan is now attempting to upgrade their fleet of 400 M60A3 tanks,

sentences.text: which are in use by the Republic of China Army and Marine Corps.

sentences.text: In 2017, two M60A3s were transferred to Taiwanese R&D institutes for evaluation.
sentences.filtered_text: In 2017, two M60A3s were transferred to Taiwanese R&D institutes for evaluation.

sentences.text: These evaluations of possible upgrades are expected to finish in 2019,

sentences.text: turret drive, sighting systems, NBC, nuclear, biological and chemical,

sentences.text: and environmental control systems,
sentences.filtered_text: and environmental control systems,

sentences.text: and what is described as an automatic loading system.
sentences.filtered_text: and what is described as an automatic loading system.

sentences.text: It's not clear if the package includes a true autoloader or is a semi-automatic loading system with an assisted rammer.
sentences.filtered_text: It's not clear if the package includes a true autoloader or is a semi-automatic loading system with an assisted rammer.

sentences.text: The 105mm M68 rifled gun is supposed to be replaced with a new 120mm smoothbore,
sentences.filtered_text: The 105mm M68 rifled gun is supposed to be replaced with a new 120mm smoothbore,

sentences.text: which would enable the tank to fire modern Western ammunition.
sentences.filtered_text: which would enable the tank to fire modern Western ammunition.

sentences.text: Active protection systems are also being considered a wise decision considering the outdated nature of the M60A3s simple steel armor hulls.
sentences.filtered_text: Active protection systems are also being considered a wise decision considering the outdated nature of the M60A3s simple steel armor hulls.

sentences.text: All upgrade components are to be taken from the commercial domestic market with the exception of the 120mm gun.

sentences.text: Despite this, Raytheon is said to be in talks with Taiwan to do technology transfer of the M60 upgrade or to provide some components for it.

sentences.text: Taiwanese sources have stated that this M60A3 upgrade package will be superior to the M1A1 in some aspects.

sentences.text: This could be true, given that the upgrade package lists an improved commander site as an option the M1A1 lacks an independent,

sentences.text: stabilized, thermal commander site, a feature only added in the M1A2.

sentences.text: Turkey
sentences.filtered_text: [人名]

sentences.text: The Turkish M60T, which is based on the Israeli Sabra upgrade,
sentences.filtered_text: The Turkish M60T, which is based on the Israeli Sabra upgrade,

sentences.text: is the most numerous of the three in actual service.
sentences.filtered_text: is the most numerous of the three in actual service.

sentences.text: The Sabra started out as a further update to surpass the Magach 7 upgrade for Israeli M60S by Israel military industries.
sentences.filtered_text: The Sabra started out as a further update to surpass the Magach 7 upgrade for Israeli M60S by Israel military industries.

sentences.text: The Israel Defense Forces, IDF, were divesting from their M60S fleet in the 2000s to focus solely on the Merkava line and did not end up adopting the Sabra.
sentences.filtered_text: The Israel Defense Forces, IDF, were divesting from their M60S fleet in the 2000s to focus solely on the Merkava line and did not end up adopting the Sabra.

sentences.text: As these M60S were not the M60A3, which includes stabilization, but rather the ancient M60A1, the Sabra modernization was quite extensive.
sentences.filtered_text: As these M60S were not the M60A3, which includes stabilization, but rather the ancient M60A1, the Sabra modernization was quite extensive.

sentences.text: In 2006 the Sabra Mk.2 package was selected, with some changed, to be the basis of Turkey's modernized M60A1S.
sentences.filtered_text: In 2006 the Sabra Mk.2 package was selected, with some changed, to be the basis of Turkey's modernized M60A1S.

sentences.text: Like the proposed Taiwanese modification, the Sabra is based around a 120mm gun which is a variant of the cannons fitted to Israeli Merkavas and is compatible with all NATO 120mm ammunition.

sentences.text: However, the M60T is not equipped with an independent thermal commander's sight, which limits its ability to maintain situational awareness and acquire follow-up targets during an engagement.

sentences.text: In the chassis, the American AVDS engine is replaced with a 1000 HP German MTU881 diesel engine, along with an upgraded suspension and transmission.

sentences.text: The M60T saw significant action as part of Turkey's involvement in Syria.

sentences.text: Some of the more obscure M60 upgrade packages are those for the Royal Thai Army's M60A3S.

sentences.text: Notably, these feature applique side armor made out of a biodegradable, lightweight, eco-friendly material, wood.

sentences.text: Upgraded TIE M60A3S also have steel frames mounted on their sides that can be filled with logs.

sentences.text: Presumably, this is to prevent light anti-tank weapons such as the RPG-7 from damaging the running gear or tracks.

sentences.text: Conclusion
sentences.filtered_text: [人名]

sentences.text: The Thai, Turkish and Taiwanese upgrade packages represent three different approaches to modernizing the M60.
sentences.filtered_text: The Thai, Turkish and Taiwanese upgrade packages represent three different approaches to modernizing the M60.

sentences.text: Taiwan is seeking to modernize the M60 as a front-line main battle tank, MBT.
sentences.filtered_text: Taiwan is seeking to modernize the M60 as a front-line main battle tank, MBT.

sentences.text: Turkey is seeking a middle ground, keeping it useful as a second-rate jack-of-all-trades tank as Ankara develops the Alte MBT.
sentences.filtered_text: Turkey is seeking a middle ground, keeping it useful as a second-rate jack-of-all-trades tank as Ankara develops the Alte MBT.

sentences.text: Thailand is modernizing their M60s primarily for use in coin-type operations, while their VT-4S and Apla TSR are for tank vs. tank combat.

sentences.filtered_text: Thailand is modernizing their M60s primarily for use in coin-type operations, while their VT-4S and Apla TSR are for tank vs. tank combat.

sentences.text: The steel armor of the M60 remains a liability, but armed with a 120mm cannon, the Patton could pose a significant threat to other tanks with modern APSTs, armor-piercing fin-stabilized discarding sabot, rounds.
